title: Object - Warrant Issuance Transaction
description: Object describing warrant issuance transaction by the issuer and held by a stakeholder

quantity.description: Quantity of shares the warrant is exercisable for

exercise_price.description: The exercise price of the warrant

purchase_price.description: Actual purchase price of the warrant (sum up purported value of all consideration, including in-kind)

exercise_triggers.title: Warrant Issuance - Exercise Trigger Array
exercise_triggers.description: In event the Warrant can convert due to trigger events (e.g. Maturity, Next Qualified Financing, Change of Control, at Election of Holder), what are the terms?

warrant_expiration_date.description: What is expiration date of the warrant (if applicable)
warrant_expiration_date.$comment: This may not be necessary as it can be expressed with the exercise_triggers

vesting_terms_id.description: Identifier of the VestingTerms to which this security is subject. If not present, security is fully vested on issuance.
